SA11n1105:833: kiṃ tu parahitāya sattvānāṃ sukhotpādanāya vicintyate |
SA11n1105:855: iti hi sarvasukhasaṃpattiheturviveka iti cetasi punaḥ punarāmukhīkaraṇāddhetoḥ upaśānto vitarkaḥ asanmanasikāro yasya saḥ |
SA11n1105:857: evaṃ pariśuddhe cetasi bhāvyamānaṃ bodhicittaṃ prakarṣapadamadhirohatīti viśeṣaṃ tuśabdena darśayati ||
SA11n1105:859: na tāvat parahitasukhāya samyak cittaṃ calati,
SA11n1105:870: ato yathā mama duḥkhaṃ bādhakaṃ tathā eṣāmapi |
SA11n1105:884: karacaraṇaśiraḥprabhṛtibhedādanekaprakāraḥ kāyo yathikatvenādhyavasitaḥ paripālanīyo bhavati duḥkhanivartanāt sukhopadhānācca,
SA11n1105:892: tadā kathamiva bhavato duḥkhamanyasaṃtāneṣu na bādhakaṃ syāt ?
SA11n1105:896: anyeṣu apareṣu śarīreṣu mama duḥkhaṃ yadi nāma prabādhakaṃ na bhavati,
SA11n1105:904: ataḥ svaparaviśeṣamapāsya duḥkhasvabhāvataiva nivartanahetuḥ | ata āha-
SA11n1105:927: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca tulyameva sukhaṃ priyam |
SA11n1105:931: naiva kaścit yena tatraiva ātmanyeva sukhotpādanāya tātparyaṃ na parasminnityarthaḥ ||
SA11n1105:933: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca na priyam |
SA11n1105:934: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yattaṃ rakṣāmi netaram ||96 ||
SA11n1105:940: tadduḥkhena na me bādhetyato yadi na rakṣyate |
SA11n1105:942: tasya parasya duḥkhena mama bādhā pīḍā nāstītyato'smāt kāraṇād yadi na rakṣyate'nyaḥ,
SA11n1105:944: yato nāgāminaḥ kāyasya paralokabhāvino narakādijātasya duḥkhātmakasya [duḥkhānme] tasyopāttasya kāyasya kācidbādhā saṃbhavati,
SA11n1105:948: yata evam, tasmāt kenābhiprāyeṇa asau rakṣyate ?
SA11n1105:949: kāya iti prakṛtatvāt pāpānnivartanāt kuśale pravartanācca ||
SA11n1105:954: ātmano nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt nirastatvācca leśataḥ tatko'yamahaṃpratyayasya viṣayo bhaviṣyati ?
SA11n1105:963: anya eva mṛto yasmādanya eva prajāyate ||98 ||
SA11n1105:966: tadā na khalu yadeva skandhapañcakamiha vinaśyati,
SA11n1105:968: api tu apūrvameva pūrvanivṛttau tatra idaṃpratyayatāviśiṣṭaṃ kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtamantarābhavasaṃtatyā samutpadyate |
SA11n1105:971: yadi tasyaiva yadduḥkhaṃ rakṣyaṃ tasyaiva tanmatam |
SA11n1105:975: tato yadā anyadduḥkhamanyasya rakṣituṃ na yujyate,
SA11n1105:976: tadā kathaṃ pādādau prahāraṃ patantaṃ dṛṣṭvā hastaṃ prasārya rakṣyate ?
SA11n1105:984: yato yadayuktaṃ yuktyā saṃgataṃ na bhavati,
SA11n1105:985: tannivartyamapasāryaṃ svakīyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca yathābalaṃ yathāsāmarthyam |
SA11n1105:990: tadetaddvayaṃ yathāsaṃbhavamihaloke paraloke ca ātmaduḥkhāpaharaṇāderniyāmakaṃ bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1105:994: yasya duḥkhaṃ sa nāstyasmātkasya tatsvaṃ bhaviṣyati ||101 ||
SA11n1105:995: saṃtāno nāma na kaścidekaḥ paramārthasan saṃbhavati |
SA11n1105:998: tasmādeteṣāmeva kṣaṇānāmekapadena pratipādanāya saṃketo kṛto buddhairvyavahārārthaṃ saṃtāna iti |
SA11n1105:1001: anyathā ātmanā kimaparāddhaṃ yenāsau na svīkriyate |
SA11n1105:1002: evaṃ samudāyo'pi na samudāyibhyo vastusan eko vidyate,
SA11n1105:1004: tattvānyatvavikalpastu asya avayavivicāreṇaiva gata iti neha pratāyate |
SA11n1105:1010: yathā anekeṣāṃ pipīlikādīnāṃ pūrvāparabhāvena vyavasthitānāṃ svarūpamantareṇa paṅktirnāsti straksūtravadekāḥ,
SA11n1105:1011: yathā ca hastyaśvapadātiprabhṛtibhyo militebhyo vyatiriktā nānyā senā kācidekā tatrāsti,
SA11n1105:1013: etacca anyatra [9.73] vistareṇa vicāritamiti neha vicāryate |
SA11n1105:1016: evamātmādeḥ svāminaḥ kasyacidabhāvād yasya saṃbandhi duḥkhaṃ sa nāsti |
SA11n1105:1020: tadā kathamayaṃ dṛṣṭānto bhaviṣyati ātmavaditi ātmasattvavaditi ca ?
SA11n1105:1027: tadā tadabhiprāyeṇaiva svaparavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā tatpratyāyanārthaṃ sādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaścocyate,
SA11n1105:1030: idamupāttapañcaskandhamātramabhisaṃdhāya dṛṣṭānte dīyamāne na kācit kṣatiḥ,
SA11n1105:1041: duḥkhatvādeva svaparāvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā vāryāṇi niṣedhyāni bhavanti |
SA11n1105:1045: yena svakīyāni ca vāryāṇi na parakīyānīti |
SA11n1105:1046: evaṃ duḥkhatvāditi heturanaikāntiko na bhavatīti samarthitam ||
SA11n1105:1047: nanu yadi duḥkhī nāma na kaścit saṃsāre saṃbhavati,
SA11n1105:1058: na ca abhyupagamamātreṇa tasya sattā prasidhyati tatsādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
SA11n1105:1066: tadvaraṃ bahuduḥkhanidānaṃ saiva prathamato notpādayituṃ yujyata iti paravacanāvakāśaṃ śaṅkamāna āha-
SA11n1105:1071: jagato duḥkhaṃ narakādikṛtamanekaprakāraṃ samīkṣya idaṃ kṛpākṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu ?
SA11n1105:1076: ekasya puruṣasya duḥkhena bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ vigacchati nivartate,
SA11n1105:1081: ātmaduḥkhaṃ na nihataṃ bahūnāṃ duḥkhināṃ vyayāt ||106 ||
SA11n1105:1082: yata eva utpādyameva tadduḥkhaṃ kṛpālunā svaparātmanoḥ ata eva supuṣpacandreṇa bodhisattvena |
SA11n1105:1090: yaduktaṃ supuṣpacandrasyetivṛttake [samādhi. 35]-tathā hi-atīte'dhvani ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājo nāma tathāgato'bhūt |
SA11n1105:1091: sa bhagavān buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā ciratarakālamavasthāya parinirvṛtaḥ |
SA11n1105:1092: tasmiṃśca parinirvṛte śāsanāntardhānasamaye rājā śūradatto nāma babhūva |
SA11n1105:1096: te ca tato rāṣṭrajanapadebhyo nirvāsitāḥ samantabhadraṃ nāma araṇyavanakhaṇḍamupasṛtya viharanti sma sārdhaṃ supuṣpacandreṇa dharmabhāṇakena |
SA11n1105:1097: atha khalu supuṣpacandrasya bodhisattvasya sattvān karuṇāyamānasya rahogatasya cetasi vitarka udapādi-yannvahaṃ janapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīrgatvā sattvān kumārgaprapannān kalyāṇe vartmani pratiṣṭhāpayāmi |
SA11n1105:1099: tairnivāryamāṇo'pi svayaṃ ca svāpadaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ tasya rājño'pi tato vanakhaṇḍānnirjagāma |
SA11n1105:1100: sa krameṇa dharmaṃ deśayan tasya rājño rājadhānīmanuprāpto bahūn sattvān rājaputrāmātyapurohitaprabhṛtīn prakāraṃ vinīya satpathe vyavasthāpayan tena rājñā dṛṣṭaḥ |
SA11n1105:1101: sahadarśanena prakuptaḥ sarva ca janakāyaṃ tadāvarjitaṃ pratipadya īrṣyādūṣitahṛdayaḥ |
SA11n1105:1104: tena tadājñāmanuvartamānena karacaraṇādicchedakrameṇa akṣīṇi ca saṃdaṃśikenoddhṛtya jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ |
SA11n1105:1105: atha tasya bhikṣo rājamārgagatasya jīvitād vyaparopitasya śarīre anekānyadbhutāni babhūvuḥ |
SA11n1105:1106: tāni pratipadya sa rājā niścitaṃ bodhisattva evāyaṃ bhikṣuriti paritāpagato bahutaraṃ paridevate sma |
SA11n1105:1108: vistareṇa punaḥ samādhirājasūtre [35] nirdiṣṭamiti tatraiva avadhāryam ||
SA11n1105:1109: na cāpi kṛpāvatāṃ paraduḥkhaduḥkhināṃ mahadapi duḥkhaṃ bādhakamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA11n1105:1113: paraduḥkhena samaṃ tulyaṃ priyaṃ sukhaheturyeṣāṃ te tathā |
SA11n1105:1115: te avīcimavagāhante paravyasanasamuddharaṇāya tadduḥkhaṃ sukhameva manyamānāḥ |
SA11n1105:1117: āvīcikamapi duḥkhaṃ sukhameva parārthe yeṣāṃ te |
SA11n1105:1126: ata eva prāmodyasāgarāḥ saṃtuṣṭisamudrāḥ kṛpāvatāṃ saṃtāneṣu prādurbhavanti |
SA11n1105:1128: ataḥ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ |
SA11n1105:1135: paratvaṃ tu svakāyasya sthitameva na duṣkaram ||112 ||
SA11n1105:1142: evaṃ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ |
SA11n1105:1143: ātmānaṃ bhojayitvaiva phalāśā na ca jāyate ||116 ||
SA11n1105:1160: yadi dāsyāmi kiṃ bhokṣye ityātmārthe piśācatā |
SA11n1105:1161: yadi bhokṣye kiṃ dadāmīti parārthe devarājatā ||125 ||
SA11n1105:1168: ye kecidduḥkhitā loke sarve te svasukhecchayā |
SA11n1105:1172: na nāma sādhyaṃ buddhatvaṃ saṃsāre'pi kutaḥ sukham |
SA11n1105:1174: āstāṃ tāvatparo loke dṛṣṭo'pyartho na sidhyati |
SA11n1105:1193: bhāvayerṣyāṃ ca mānaṃ ca nirvikalpena cetasā ||140 ||
SA11n1105:1194: eṣa satkriyate nāhaṃ lābhī nāhamayaṃ yathā |
SA11n1105:1196: ahaṃ karomi karmāṇi tiṣṭhatyeṣa tu susthitaḥ |
SA11n1105:1197: ayaṃ kila mahāṃlloke nīco'haṃ kila nirguṇaḥ ||142 ||
SA11n1105:1199: santi te yeṣvahaṃ nīcaḥ santi te yeṣvahaṃ varaḥ ||143 ||
SA11n1105:1208: api sarvatra me loke bhaveyuḥ prakaṭā guṇāḥ |
SA11n1105:1209: api nāma guṇā ye'sya na śroṣyantyapi kecana ||148 ||
SA11n1105:1210: chādyerannapi me doṣāḥ syānme pūjāsya no bhavet |
SA11n1105:1211: sulabdhā adya me lābhāḥ pūjito'hamayaṃ na tu ||149 ||
SA11n1105:1214: asyāpi hi varākasya spardhā kila mayā saha |
SA11n1105:1215: kimasya śrutametāvat prajñā rūpaṃ kulaṃ dhanam ||151 ||
SA11n1105:1226: abhaviṣyadidaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yadi tvayā |
SA11n1105:1247: evaṃ kuruṣva tiṣṭhaivaṃ na kartavyamidaṃ tvayā |
SA11n1105:1251: kva yāsyasi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sarvadarpānnihanmi te |
SA11n1105:1253: adyāpyasti mama svārtha ityāśāṃ tyaja sāṃpratam |
SA11n1105:1255: tvāṃ sattveṣu na dāsyāmi yadi nāma pramodataḥ |
SA11n1105:1256: tvaṃ māṃ narakapāleṣu pradāsyasi na saṃśayaḥ ||171 ||
SA11n1105:1271: kiṃ mamānena yantreṇa jīvinā vā mṛtena vā |
SA11n1105:1272: loṣṭādeḥ ko viśeṣo'sya hāhaṃkāraṃ na naśyasi ||179 ||
SA11n1105:1276: na ca sneho na ca dveṣastatra snehaṃ karomi kim ||181 ||
SA11n1105:1277: roṣo yasya khalīkārāttoṣo yasya ca pūjayā |
SA11n1105:1278: sa eva cenna jānāti śramaḥ kasya kṛtena me ||182 ||
SA11n1105:1279: imaṃ ye kāyamicchanti te'pi me suhṛdaḥ kila |
SA11n1105:1280: sarve svakāyamicchanti te'pi kasmānna me priyāḥ ||183 ||
